item.title: Access Control in Cplusplus
item.author: xxxx
item.description: Background C++ provides programmers with a powerful set of access control modifiers, today I’ll talk about private, public and protected with three different types of inheritance in C++. Before I start, I’d like to thank Antoine JOUGLET of UTC and his LO21 course for helping me sort out these concepts. Why access control? 访问控制符需要解决的问题？
